answerText: L-MAO [or L-monoamine oxidases; do not prompt on partial answers][10] MAO proteins are bound to the outer membranes of these organelles, cellular powerhouses you got from your mum.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 8 | 12 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A variant of the gene that codes for an isozyme of this enzyme family is known as the warrior gene. For 10 points each: [10] Name this family of enzymes, with such creatively named types as "A" and "B", that deaminates neurotransmitters like dopamine and serotonin.
